import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Navigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Navtop from '../../components/common/Navtop'; const BookEntry = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ title : "", author: "", publication: "", price:"", file: "" }); const handleChange = (event) =>{ setData({ ...data,[event.target.name]: event.target.value}); console.log(data.username); } const loggedInUser = localStorage.getItem("authenticated"); if(!loggedInUser){ return ; }else{ return (
Book Hut - New Book Entry
New Book Entry Form
) } } export default BookEntry;
